text: Simon Eine (8 August 1936 â€“ 30 September 2020) was a French actor and comedian. He was born in Paris. He became a Knight of the Legion of Honour in 1997. He was known for his roles in Another Man, Another Chance (1977), Notre musique (2004) and in Sarah's Key (2006). Eine died on 30 September 2020 in Paris, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:French comedians Category:Actors from Paris
